header.title: Automated Financial Statements and Profit Calculation.
header.description: Keeping track of the financials of your business was never this easy. Get financial statements and profit status with zero efforts!

sections.header: Get Automated Financial Statements and Profit Calculation
sections.description: Fliqbook calculates profits automatically using your Amazon MTR, purchase & expense data. It can even generate income statements, cash flow statements and balance sheets quickly and accurately. They are available in form of summary tables as well as visual charts. With no manual calculation,you save so much time and ultimately your money!
